title: Worked Solution
text: We can convert $$\frac{m}{s}$$ to $$\frac{km}{h}$$ by multiplying by $$3.6$$ (since $$1$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$ $$=$$ $$1000$$ $$\frac{m}{3600}$$ s $$=$$ $$0.27778$$ m/s):\n$$342$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ $$x$$ $$3.6$$ $$=$$ $$1231.2$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$\nTherefore, the speed of sound on this day is approximately $$1231.2$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$.
